group_1.textRight: Then that means...
The “Will of the Universe” that kept me away@from the old school building...
It was little Rion’s wish...

group_1.textLeft: Most likely.
But you fought against it, and you have come@this far.

group_1.textRight: ...Er, was that bad?

group_1.textLeft: If you fight the Witch and lose, we will have the@same outcome as before.

group_1.textRight: The old school building... Collapses again?

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.
That possibility has yet to disappear from@this world.
And if the Witch isn't defeated, the disaster will@still happen in the future.
The reason that time progressed so slowly...
...was likely due to her wish's power as well.
It was trying to push back the moment of the@tragedy, even if a little bit.
But that wasn’t going to stop it, it would just@prolong the inevitable.
Someone still needs to defeat this Witch...
Perhaps that duty has been entrusted to you.
The duty of defeating the Witch in that dead@White Feather's stead.

group_1.textRight: Eh?
Please wait a moment, don’t you think that's@too big of a leap?

group_1.textLeft: I have my evidence. After the world changed...
You obtained that White Feather robe in@your bag.
And in this modified world, you stayed at school.

group_1.textRight: Right...

group_1.textLeft: It may be that your presence here is essential@to control the situation.

group_1.textRight: But, why me...?

group_1.textLeft: If I had to guess, I'd say the reason is your wish.
Do you remember your wish from when you@became a Magical Girl?

group_1.textCenter: I don't want to just continue along the rails that@my parents laid out for me.
To live a happy, yet boring daily life...

group_1.textRight: Stop! Stop stop stop!
Please don’t bring up such an embarrassing past.

group_1.textLeft: There's nobody else around to hear it, though?

group_1.textRight: My heart doesn't want to hear it!
At any rate, thanks to that...
I'm now enjoying an ever-so-thrilling life, one@utterly devoid of boredom.

group_1.textLeft: Look back. Compared to previous events...
Were today's events something that required@your unique skills?

group_1.textRight: ...I was just scurrying around during the havoc@about the old building,
Since Rion's wish cleared up those problems@right away.
...So you're saying that from here on out is@where my power's really needed?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it will most likely be used to defeat the@Witch of this Labyrinth.

group_1.textRight: ...Even so, how did such a dangerous Witch@appear?

group_1.textLeft: Kamihama City was just struck by a major@disaster.
There are a lot of places where negative@emotions are accumulating.

group_1.textRight: I can't do this... It was already too much for@even a White Feather to handle!
But then why...
Why does there even need to be a substitute?
The accident didn’t happen, right?
If so, then that White Feather shouldn’t@have died.

group_1.textLeft: Unfortunately, it appears that the modification@was incomplete.
Her death was never undone, and I was left@behind in the Labyrinth as well.

group_1.textRight: No way...
(In other words, the corpse of the White Feather...)
(Is still somewhere in this Labyrinth...)

group_1.textLeft: There are several other flaws in this modification@to the world, as well.
Some people retained their pre-modified@memories, like you and me.

group_1.textRight: The wish was imperfect...? Why?

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps that was simply the limit of the karma@that Rion Yuzuki bore.
Though, judging by your story, Rion Yuzuki@hasn't noticed the changes...
And is simply convinced that she's been a@Magical Girl for some time.

group_1.textRight: ...But they seemed to have admired the White@Feather as a big sister.
They even said that they joined the Wings of@the Magius because of her....

group_1.textLeft: I would imagine that's a false past. Just a@fabricated memory...
Created from the image of the White Feather@who perished while saving them.
In fact, the only one who belonged to The Wings@of the Magius...
...was her sister, Hotori Yuzuki. Rion wasn’t a@Magical Girl yet, after all.

group_1.textRight: So while it is true that a 'White Feather Big@Sister' saved them...
The truth is that it didn’t happen in the past,@it should've happened later today.
...This is impossible.
A Black Feather like me can't  be a substitute.@There is no way that I can help.

group_1.textLeft: You tend to underestimate your abilities.
You’re not as weak as you think.

group_1.textRight: Is that so?

group_1.textLeft: But the Witch of this Labyrinth is special.@You have no chance of winning.

group_1.textRight: ...Please don’t push me down right after giving@me hope.

group_1.textLeft: Well, it depends on how you go about this.
For example, you could win if you fought@alongside 5-6 veteran Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: I see. So, I need to find some teammates...
